house_listing.house_description: This 2 level single family home built in 1999 has 4 bedroom(s), 2 full bath(s)/5 half bath(s) , 3 car attached garage and approximately 3510 square feet of living area. Rooms include family room, living room. Features include fireplace, air conditioning.
house_listing.firm_name: Beazley Co., Realtors Beazley Co., Realtors
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Carpet, Eat In Kitchen, Hardwood Flooring, Office
